page.title: 09Shops in Mark
page.content: Amesbury and Puddy have a{farm shop opposite the Church. Mr Puddy is in charge of the stores which cater mainly for farmers. You can buy anything from a packet of seeds to a tractor. At the back of the shop is a {forge.}Mr Amesbury is the Blacksmith and you can take your pony or horse to be shod. He will come to you if necessary. He also makes ornamental wrought iron goods such as gates (the Church gates were made here),fire baskets and irons.In the workshop repairs are carried out to lawn mowers,chain saws and agricultural machinery can be welded. Besides the{General Stores and Post {Office,}there is a{greengrocer's, {bakery}(which used to be a cycle shop) and a{craft/coffee}shop,the Mustard Seed which is run by the Church and all the profits go to the Church.
